p: The spread of indigenous DF incidence rates in each high-risk street was displayed in Fig 3. All streets in Yuexiu, Liwan and Haizhu district, several streets in Baiyun, Panyu and Tianhe districts and streets in Huangpu, Luogang and Nansha district had relatively high DF spread. The streets with highest increase in DF were located in Baiyun, Panyu and Huangpu district. Baiyun districts included the streets with highest spread.
